workflow.name: Personalized cold lead re-engagement with Zoho CRM and GPT-4o-mini
workflow.description:
## Description:
Reignite cold leads automatically with this intelligent n8n automation template that integrates Zoho CRM, Azure OpenAI (GPT-4o-mini), and Email.
This workflow identifies leads that haven‚Äôt been contacted in the last 30 days, generates personalized AI-written emails based on lead data, sends them directly, and updates the CRM‚Äîall without manual follow-up.
Perfect for sales teams, marketing managers, and business development professionals who want to recover lost opportunities, boost engagement rates, and maintain an active sales pipeline with minimal effort.

## ‚úÖ What This Template Does (Step-by-Step)

‚è∞ Daily Trigger
 Automatically runs on a set schedule (daily or weekly) to check for inactive leads.

üìÖ Calculate 30 Days Ago
 Computes the exact date threshold (today ‚àí 30 days) to filter stale leads from Zoho CRM.

üîç Fetch Cold Leads from Zoho
 Searches Zoho CRM for leads whose Last Activity occurred before the calculated date‚Äîreturning only those needing re-engagement.

ü§ñ AI Email Generation
 Uses Azure OpenAI (GPT-4o-mini) to analyze each lead‚Äôs data and craft a personalized re-engagement email that reflects their previous interactions, interests, or stage in the funnel.

üìß Send Personalized Email
 Delivers the custom AI-generated email directly to each lead.
 Subject: ‚ÄúLet‚Äôs Reconnect!‚Äù
 Body: Tailored, human-like message written by AI.

‚úÖ Update CRM Record
 After each email is sent, the workflow updates the lead in Zoho CRM‚Äîmarking them as contacted, refreshing the Last Activity timestamp, and maintaining accurate engagement history.

## üß† Key Features
 ‚úîÔ∏è Smart lead filtering based on inactivity window
 ‚úîÔ∏è AI-crafted, context-aware personalized emails
 ‚úîÔ∏è Seamless Zoho CRM integration for tracking and updates
 ‚úîÔ∏è Fully automated daily execution
 ‚úîÔ∏è Customizable for different CRMs or intervals

## üíº Use Cases
 üí° Re-engage leads who‚Äôve gone silent for 30+ days
 üìà Improve conversion and response rates automatically
 ü§ù Maintain continuous pipeline nurturing
 üîÅ Save hours of manual email follow-up

## üì¶ Required Integrations
 ‚Ä¢ Zoho CRM API ‚Äì for fetching and updating lead data
 ‚Ä¢ Azure OpenAI API (GPT-4o-mini) ‚Äì for email personalization
 ‚Ä¢ SMTP / Email API ‚Äì for sending re-engagement emails

## üéØ Why Use This Template?
 ‚úÖ Automates your entire cold-lead revival process
 ‚úÖ Saves manual outreach time for sales reps
 ‚úÖ Increases lead conversion through personalized AI communication
 ‚úÖ Keeps CRM data fresh and accurate

parameters.content:
## Data Retrieval
Fetches leads from Zoho CRM that haven't been contacted in 30+ days. Returns lead details including contact info, scores, and activity history.

## Lead Scoring & Filtering
Calculates engagement scores and priority tiers (HOT/WARM/COLD) based on inactivity. Filters out low-value leads (score <60).

## Industry Segmentation
Routes leads to Tech, Healthcare, or General segments for tailored messaging.

## AI Personalization
Generates custom email content using GPT-4o based on lead profile, industry, and inactivity period. Sets up A/B test variants for subject lines.

## Multi-Channel Outreach
Sends personalized emails to all qualified leads. HOT priority leads with phone numbers also receive SMS follow-ups via Twilio.

## CRM Update & Analytics
Updates lead records in Zoho with outreach status and aggregates campaign metrics (segment performance, A/B results, priority breakdown).

options.systemMessage: You are an expert sales copywriter specializing in authentic, personalized B2B outreach.

parameters.content:
## Overview: Cold Lead Reviver

**How it works:**
This workflow automatically re-engages cold leads from your Zoho CRM on a set schedule. It fetches leads inactive for 30+ days, scores them based on engagement history, segments by industry, and sends personalized AI-generated emails. High-priority leads (90+ days inactive) also receive SMS follow-ups. The workflow includes A/B testing for subject lines and tracks campaign performance.

**Setup steps:**
1. Configure Zoho CRM credentials in "Fetch Cold Leads" node
2. Set up Azure OpenAI credentials in "GPT-4o Mini Model" node
3. Add SMTP credentials in "Send Email" node
4. (Optional) Configure Twilio credentials in "Send SMS" node for hot leads
5. Adjust the schedule trigger to your preferred cadence
6. Update industry segmentation rules if needed

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details: The Function node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow. Unlike the Function Item node, this node does not operate on incoming node data per-item. Instead, you must iterate over multiple items of incoming data yourself. This can be useful if you're performing data transformation where you want to manipulate the number of items being outputted by the node (i.e. 1 item is inputted in with nested object, 10 items are outputted without any nested objects)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
